extension.summary: 32 bits ARM libraries from S805 to run RetroArch on S905/S905X (64 bit)
extension.description:
This addon just provides the 32 bits linux libraries required to run the 32 bit RetroArch binary and cores compiled for S805 devices on a S905/S905X 64 bits device.
You need to have a kernel which allows for running 32 bit binaries (most likely you already have one) and the RetroArch addon created by JoKeRzBoX which supports using these libraries.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unofficial addon. Please don't ask for support in LibreELEC/OpenELEC forums / irc channels

extension.summary: RetroArch addon. Provides binary/cores plus settings to help configure and launch it
extension.description:
RetroArch addon based on source modified by Lakka project. Provides binary and core libraries compiled for S805 ARM plus settings to help configure and launch it.
[I][B]Note:[/B] to run on 64 bit ARM (AARCH64) such as S905(X), make sure linux kernel is compiled with option for running 32 bits binary and that addon "32bit Libs for RetroArch" (emulator.tools.32bitlibs) is installed.[/I]
extension.disclaimer: this is an unofficial addon. please don't ask for support in openelec forum / irc channel
